text: Webinar is a term used for different teleconferencing solutions: Usually, it consists of someone holding a presentation, which other people can follow over the internet. The solution usually allows these people to interact with the speaker, for example to ask questions about the presentation. Finally, there is a means of access control, to limit who can take part. One example of a webinar platform is Vimeo, which allows users to host live, hybrid, or pre- recorded webinars from their browser. Category:Internet communication
title: Webinar
